media_data.title: A Deadly Education
media_data.author: Naomi Novik
media_data.short_description: A Deadly Education is set in a magical school called the Scholomance, where failure means certain death. The story follows Galadriel 'El' Higgins, a powerful, albeit reluctantly so, sorceress who must navigate the school's many dangers - both human and monster alike - to survive until graduation.
